before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"c55kk","text":"This protocol was performed in heterozygous DAT-Cre:Ai95D (4-7 weeks) mice. These mice were bred from homozygous DAT-Cre mice (B6.SJL-Slc6a3tm1.1(cre)Bkmn/J, JAX stock number 006660) crossed with homozygous Ai95D mice (B6;129S-Gt(ROSA)26Sortm95.1(CAG-GCaMP6f)Hze/J, JAX stock number 028865). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":138,"length":16},{"style":"sup","offset":240,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53r27","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46maf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bp6m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"445eq","text":"We prepare ex vivo mouse brain slices by performing steps 1 to 11 from Protocol: Fast-scan cyclic voltammetry to assess dopamine release in ex vivo mouse brain slices. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":71,"length":95}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":95}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4tbcu","text":"Ai95(RCL-GCaMP6f)-D (also called Ai95D; RRID:IMSR_JAX:028865) mice are a Cre-dependent, fluorescent, calcium-indicator tool strain. Ai95D has a floxed-STOP cassette preventing transcription of the GCaMP6 fast variant calcium indicator (GCaMP6f; a detector of single neuronal action potentials with fast response kinetics). After Cre exposure, bright EGFP fluorescence is observed following calcium binding (such as neuronal activation).","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3iho","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":54,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6736a","text":"This Ai95D allele is on a C57BL/6J genetic background.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8AFC1AA50F90431BBBD5661BE5A1F0AA","url":"http://10.17504/protocols.io.36wgqdbmxvk5/v1"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"uno2","text":"This protocol describes how to image calcium dynamics in striatal dopaminergic axons in ex vivo mouse brain slices. We imaged calcium transients in response to single and trains (4 pulses, 100 Hz) of electrical stimulus pulses using genetically encoded calcium indicator GCaMP6f expressed in DAT-Cre:Ai95D mice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":88,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3pej","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8vf9","text":"Olympus BX51Wl microscope equipped with a OptoLED Lite system (CAIRN Research);","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kl04","text":"Prime Scientiﬁc CMOS (sCMOS) Camera (Teledyne Photometrics);","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjrpu","text":"x40/0.8 NA water-objective (Olympus UK)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi656","text":"ITC-18 A/D board (Instrutech)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bresr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26g4t","text":"Software:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uv0r","text":"Micro-Manager v1.4","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hhnb","text":"Matlab vR2019b ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7tm0","text":"Fiji v1.5","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bevl0","text":"Igor Pro 6 (WaveMetrics)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Zhang, Y. et al (2025) - An axonal brake on striatal dopamine output  by cholinergic interneurons

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fhopg","text":"Change the exposure time to reach a frame rate of around 16.6 Hz every 2.5 min using Micro-Manager v1.4. 16.6 Hz frame rate every 2.5 min using Micro-Manager 1.4. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ng90","text":"The following steps were performed in MATLAB vR2019b and Fiji v1.5.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":67}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8d6g","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7midt","text":"Extract ﬂuorescence intensity from the region of interest 25 µm * 25 µm which was 50 µm away from the electrical stimulating electrode tip.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ufho","text":"After background subtraction, bleach-correct the Ca2+ transients by ﬁtting an exponential curve function through both the baseline (2 s prior to stimulation) and the last 1 s in a 7.2 s recording window.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":51,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ajtiu","text":"Expressed data as ΔF/F where F is the ﬁtted curve.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qfaf","text":"Using a x40/0.8 NA water-objective (Olympus UK), position the stimulating electrode on the surface of the brain slice and centre it in the field of view.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8luji","text":"Apply electrical stimulus pulses singly and in trains (4 pulses, 100 Hz) using custom-written procedures in Igor Pro 6 (WaveMetrics) and an ITC-18 A/D board (Instrutech).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95o7a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3gpta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8f58d","text":"The order of single and train stimulations was alternated and equally distributed and data were collected in duplicate before and after a change in extracellular experimental condition. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rudt","text":"Record changes in fluorescence intensity using custom-written procedures in Igor Pro 6 (WaveMetrics) and an ITC-18 A/D board (Instrutech).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
